page.title: 08Sports Centres in Braintree.
page.content: Braintree in Essex has one public sports complex for swimming and squash. { The Riverside Centre}has one swimming area, containing one teaching pool and one larger pool. The shallow end of the teaching pool is half a metre deep and learners may enter by a series of wide steps. The depth gradually increases to one metre. In the larger, twenty five metre pool the depth ranges from one to five metres. {Lessons}are held here by trained staff for all ages of the public. A{swimming club}is held. Next to the swimming pool, there are the{squash courts.}These are set in their own complex linked to the changing rooms by a passage. The three courts are generally in constant use. A{refreshment area}exists.
